flawed_nl_solution:
He sold an average of 16 books per month across all 3 months so he must have sold a total of 3*16 = <<16*3=84>>84 books in those 3 months
He sold 15+16 = <<15+16=31>>31 in January and February
He must have sold 84-31 = <<84-31=53>>53 books in March
#### 53

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 48, not 84. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
